north of house.description: You are at the north side of the white house. There is a path here leading north.

path.description: You are on a winding path that leads through the forest. A large tree with low branches stands here.

forest1.description: You are in a forest. Ancient trees tower above you.

forest2.description: You are in a dense forest. The trees seem to close in around you.

mountains.description: You are in a mountainous area. The peaks loom ominously above you.

canyon_view.description: You are at Canyon View. Below you can see the magnificent Aragain Falls.

clearing.description: You are in a clearing. The forest opens up here, allowing sunlight to stream through.

house.description: You are at the white house. It's an old, weathered building with a boarded front door.

living room.description: You are in the living room of the white house. A beautiful oriental rug lies in the center. A wooden door leads east into the kitchen. A trophy case stands against one wall.

actions.move rug: You discover a trapdoor under the rug leading to the cellar!

east of house.description: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. There is a small window here which is slightly ajar.

actions.open: The window is already slightly open.

kitchen.description: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A window is open to the east, and a door leads west.

attic.description: This is the attic. The only exit is a stairway leading down, though there appears to be a tunnel leading north into darkness.

south of house.description: You are at the south side of the white house.

west of house.description: You are at the west side of the white house. There is a small mailbox here.

actions.open mailbox: Opening the mailbox reveals a leaflet.

cellar.description: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. A rickety wooden staircase leads up.

east of chasm.description: You are on the east edge of a chasm, the bottom of which cannot be seen. A narrow passage leads north, and the path you are on continues to the east. The path from below ends here, blocked by a massive fallen boulder.

actions.jump: In a moment of insanity, you jump into the chasm. You hit the bottom... eventually.

open coffin.message: The coffin breaks open as it hits the bottom of the chasm, revealing a beautiful golden sceptre!

wave sceptre.message: As you wave the sceptre, a magical light fills the chasm, revealing a pot of gold that was hidden in the shadows!

gallery.description: This appears to be an art gallery. The walls are lined with paintings and there is a beautiful portrait prominently displayed.

studio.description: This appears to be the studio of a painter, but it has been neglected for years. Paint drippings cover everything, and several early attempts at painting have been left on easels to gather dust. A dark and narrow chimney leads up. A doorway leads south.

troll room.description: This is a small room with passages to the east and south. Bloodstains and deep scratches mar the walls. A menacing troll brandishing a bloody axe blocks all passages out of the room.

actions.attack troll with sword: The troll, disarmed by your skilled swordplay, takes flight. The troll, defeated, disappears into the gloom.
actions.throw garlic at troll: The troll catches the garlic and runs away in disgust. The troll, defeated, disappears into the gloom.

east west passage.description: This is a long east-west passage. There are exits to the north and east.

dam base.description: You are at the base of the dam. A pile of plastic lies on the ground - it appears to be a Frobozz Magic Inflatable Boat.

inflate plastic.message: The plastic pile inflates into a sturdy rubber boat!

dam.description: You are standing on top of the Flood Control Dam #3. The dam's control panel has a large bolt and several indicator lights, including a green bubble. Paths lead north and south.

turn bolt with wrench.message: The bolt turns! A rumbling sound fills the area as the sluice gates open and water begins to flow. The green bubble glows brightly.

dam lobby.description: This room appears to have been the waiting room for tours of the dam. There are exits to the north and east, and a path leads south across the top of the dam.

maintenance room.description: This is what appears to have been the maintenance room for the dam. Rusty tools and broken machinery lie everywhere. There is a prominent yellow button on one wall.

loud room.description: This is a large room with a ceiling which cannot be detected from the ground. There is a narrow passage from east to west and a stone stairway leading upward. The room is deafeningly loud with an undetermined rushing sound. The sound seems to reverberate from all of the walls, making it difficult even to think.

actions.echo: The acoustics of the room cause your voice to echo and reverberate. As the sound dies away, you notice a platinum bar has appeared!

round room.description: This is a circular room with passages in all directions. The walls are made of stone and are inscribed with strange runes.

dome room.description: You are at the periphery of a large dome, which forms the ceiling of another room below. Protecting you from a precipitous drop is a wooden railing which circles the dome.

actions.tie rope to railing: You tie the rope securely to the railing. It dangles down into the darkness below.

torch room.description: This is a large room with a prominent doorway leading to a down staircase. Above you is a large dome. A passage leads south.

temple.description: This is the temple. A passage leads south and massive wooden doors lead west. The doors are locked.

actions.pray: A voice whispers: 'The doors are now unlocked.'

egyptian room.description: This is the Egyptian Room. Ancient hieroglyphs cover the walls, and a stone coffin rests in the center.

altar.description: This is the altar. A huge mirror fills the north wall. A small window can be seen in the east wall.

cave.description: This is a dark and damp cave. A stairway leads up to the temple, and another stairway leads down.

entrance to hades.description: You are outside a large gateway inscribed 'Abandon every hope all ye who enter here!' The gate is guarded by demons.

actions.ring bell: The bell suddenly becomes red hot! You drop it, along with the candles!

light candles with match.message: The candles are now lit, casting an eerie glow.

hades.description: You are in Hades. Flames leap up from fiery pits, and demons dance in the shadows.

mirror room south.description: You are in a large square room with tall ceilings. Huge mirrors line the walls, making it difficult to tell which are doors and which are mirrors.

rub mirror.message: As you rub the mirror, your surroundings shimmer and shift. You find yourself in a different mirror room!

mirror room north.description: This mirror room looks almost identical to the one you were just in, but something feels different.

squeaky room.description: The floor boards squeak loudly with every step. A strong draft blows from the north.

bat room.description: This room is filled with sleeping bats hanging from the ceiling. You'd better not wake them!

shaft room.description: You are in a room with a deep shaft. A basket on a chain hangs here.

put torch in basket.message: You place the torch in the basket.

put coal in basket.message: You put the coal in the basket with the torch.

actions.send basket: You send the basket down the shaft.
actions.lower basket: You lower the basket down the shaft.

smelly room.description: This room has a peculiar odor, different from the gas room.

gas room.description: This is a gas-filled room. A strong chemical smell permeates the air. A passage leads east into what appears to be a coal mine.

coal mine.description: You are in a coal mine. The walls are covered in coal dust and old mining equipment lies scattered about.

mine 1.description: This is a narrow mine passage. The walls are rough and uneven.

mine 2.description: This is a narrow mine passage. Coal dust covers everything.

mine 3.description: This is a narrow mine passage. Old mining equipment is scattered about.

ladder top.description: You are at the top of a rickety wooden ladder that descends into darkness.

ladder bottom.description: You are at the bottom of a rickety wooden ladder. A passage leads west.

timber room.description: This is a room filled with old mining timbers. A narrow crack in the west wall looks just barely wide enough to squeeze through.

drafty room.description: This is the drafty room at the bottom of the shaft. A basket hangs here, and passages lead east and south.

take torch from basket.message: You take the torch from the basket.

take coal from basket.message: You take the coal from the basket.

machine room.description: This is a room filled with machinery. A large coal-burning machine dominates the center of the room. A passage leads north.

actions.open lid: You open the machine's lid, revealing a coal chamber.

turn switch with screwdriver.message: The machine rumbles to life, processing the coal. After a moment, it stops.

reservoir south.description: You are at the south end of a large reservoir. The dam's sluice gates are open, allowing passage to the north.

go north.message: You proceed north through the open sluice gates.

reservoir.description: You are in the middle of a vast reservoir. The water stretches out in all directions.

reservoir north.description: You are at the north end of the reservoir. A passage leads north into darkness.

atlantis room.description: This appears to be the ruins of the legendary city of Atlantis. Ancient columns rise from the water.

in boat.description: You are sitting in a rubber boat on the river. The current is strong here.

actions.wait: The boat drifts in the current...
actions.launch: The boat begins to move with the current.

sandy beach.description: You are on a sandy beach at the edge of the river. The water is too rough to swim.

actions.exit boat: You step out of the boat onto the beach.
actions.get out: You step out of the boat onto the beach.

sandy cave.description: This is a sandy cave near the beach. The sand here seems loose and shifting.

actions.dig sand: You dig deeper in the sand...

aragain falls.description: You are at the base of Aragain Falls. A beautiful rainbow arcs across the falls.

end of rainbow.description: You are at the end of the rainbow. The sun shines brightly here, creating the beautiful arc you just crossed.

canyon bottom.description: You are at the bottom of the canyon. A rainbow arcs across the chasm, its colors shimmering in the sunlight.

open coffin.message: The coffin creaks open, revealing an ancient sceptre inside.

wave sceptre.message: As you wave the sceptre, the rainbow solidifies into a beautiful bridge! A pot of gold appears at its base.

look.message: You are at the bottom of the canyon. A rainbow arcs across the chasm, its colors shimmering in the sunlight. {if roomStates.canyon bottom.rainbowSolid}The rainbow has solidified into a beautiful bridge. A pot of gold glimmers at its base.{/if}

large tree.description: You are at the base of a large tree. Its branches look climbable.

tree top.description: You are in the top of the large tree. There is a bird's nest here.

wind canary.message: You wind up the mechanical canary and carefully remove it from the jeweled egg. Now you have both a beautiful mechanical canary and an exquisite jeweled egg!

adventurers remains.description: You are in a small room. The skeletal remains of a previous adventurer lie here, clutching some items.

actions.touch skeleton: As you touch the skeleton, a deadly curse takes effect. You die instantly!
actions.take skeleton: As you touch the skeleton, a deadly curse takes effect. You die instantly!

cyclops room.description: This is the lair of the cyclops. The walls are decorated with human bones.

actions.ulysses: At the sound of his ancient enemy's name, the cyclops flees in terror, smashing through the wall to the living room!
actions.odysseus: At the sound of his ancient enemy's name, the cyclops flees in terror, smashing through the wall to the living room!

give food.message: The cyclops accepts the food and water, then falls into a deep sleep.

treasure room.description: This is a large room filled with treasures. A suspicious-looking thief lurks in the shadows.

give egg to thief.message: The thief examines the egg carefully and pockets it with a grin.

kill thief with knife.message: You catch the thief off guard! After a brief struggle, he falls to the ground, dropping his loot.

grating room.description: You are in a small room with a metal grating in the ceiling. A pile of leaves has fallen through.

go up.message: You climb up through the grating into the forest.

unlock grate.message: You unlock the grating with the brass key.

open grate.message: You open the grating. Some leaves fall in from above.

forest clearing.description: You are in a clearing in the forest. A metal grating is set into the ground here.

stone barrow.description: You are in an ancient stone barrow. Strange runes are carved into the walls. A dark passage leads downward into the earth.

actions.go down: You have completed Zork I! The passage leads to Zork II...

itemDescriptions.leaflet:
Welcome to ZORK!

ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals.

No computer should be without one!
itemDescriptions.egg: The egg is covered in intricate jeweled patterns. You can't seem to find a way to open it.
itemDescriptions.sack: Opening the sack reveals a lunch and a clove of garlic.
itemDescriptions.axe: This is a bloody axe, evidence of its owner's violent tendencies.
itemDescriptions.platinum bar: This is a large and very heavy platinum bar.
itemDescriptions.bell: This is a beautiful brass bell.
itemDescriptions.torch: This is an ancient torch, still burning brightly.
itemDescriptions.rope: This is a sturdy rope, suitable for climbing.
itemDescriptions.book: This appears to be a prayer book written in Latin.
itemDescriptions.coffin: This is an elaborately decorated stone coffin, covered in hieroglyphs.
itemDescriptions.sceptre: This is a beautiful golden sceptre, encrusted with precious gems.
itemDescriptions.crystal skull: This is an exquisitely carved crystal skull, perfectly transparent.
itemDescriptions.gas mask: This is a standard-issue gas mask, it should protect you from toxic fumes.
itemDescriptions.coins: These are ancient coins, possibly valuable to collectors.
itemDescriptions.knife: This is a sharp knife, useful for cutting things.
itemDescriptions.coal: This is a chunk of coal, still good for burning.
itemDescriptions.timber: This is a broken timber, apparently left over from the mine's operational days.
itemDescriptions.diamond: This is a brilliant diamond, clearly worth a fortune.
itemDescriptions.bracelet: This is an exquisite jade bracelet.
itemDescriptions.jade figurine: This is an exquisite jade figurine.
itemDescriptions.trunk of jewels: This is an ornate trunk filled with precious jewels.
itemDescriptions.air pump: This is a hand-operated air pump.
itemDescriptions.crystal trident: This is a beautiful crystal trident.
itemDescriptions.plastic boat: This is a deflated Frobozz Magic Inflatable Boat.
itemDescriptions.shovel: This is a sturdy shovel, perfect for digging.
itemDescriptions.scarab: This is an ancient Egyptian scarab, beautifully carved.
itemDescriptions.buoy: This is a navigation buoy. It looks like it might open.
itemDescriptions.jeweled egg: This is a beautiful egg, encrusted with precious jewels.
itemDescriptions.bag of coins: This is a heavy bag of ancient coins.
itemDescriptions.key: This is an ornate brass key.
itemDescriptions.chalice: This is an exquisite silver chalice.
itemDescriptions.bauble: This is a beautiful golden bauble dropped by the mechanical canary.
itemDescriptions.portrait: This is a beautiful portrait prominently displayed.

deathMessages.skeleton:
As you touch the skeleton, a deadly curse takes effect. You die instantly!

*** You have died ***

You scored 0 out of a possible 350 points.
Would you like to restart the game?

take.description: Adds an item to your inventory.

use.description: Uses an item in your inventory.

inventory.description: Lists all items in your inventory.

unlock.description: Unlocks a locked door or object.

drop.description: Drops an item from your inventory.

examine.description: Examines an item or object closely.

look.description: Describes the current room and its items.

open.description: Opens a container, door, or window.

enter.description: Enters a building, passage, or window.

exit.description: Exits through a door or window.

ring.description: Ring a bell or similar object.

light.description: Light a candle, torch, or similar object.
